text: kōṭṭaikaḷāl araṇ ceyyappaṭṭa ūrkaḷilō allatu matilkaḷukku appāl iruntu koṇṭō allāmal avarkaḷ ellōrum oṉṟu cērntu uṅkaḷuṭaṉ pōriṭa māṭṭārkaḷ, avarkaḷukkuḷḷēyē pōrum, pakaiyum mikak kaṭumaiyāṉavai, (innilaiyil) avarkaḷ yāvarum oṉṟu paṭṭiruppatāka nīr eṇṇukiṟīr; (āṉāl) avarkaḷuṭaiya itayaṅkaḷ, citaṟik kiṭakkiṉṟaṉa - itaṟkuk kāraṇam; meyyākavē avarkaḷ aṟivaṟṟa camūkattār eṉpatutāṉ
